infinitewater.ponder.infinite_water.head: Infinite Water Block
infinitewater.ponder.infinite_water.text: The Infinite Water Source can provide unlimited water
Enter the stress at the TOP or BOTTOM.
Requires at least 1,000,000 su of remaining stress capacity
If stress is below 1,000,000 su, water will NOT be supplied
When stress >= 1,000,000 su, unlimited water becomes available
Water can be extracted from all four SIDES
Connect pipes to any side to extract water
Use Mechanical Pumps to extract water
